## Source: amazon-inspector (37cd604b28cb577df0057a572f81e0fbda0029eb9017abcdea709811fefbc3d7)
The package node-calculator-0f50 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0d86babe1df91a7c0297aa0554f734b87756da555ca9048e66b5547dc1a46d3d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'node-calculator-0f50' @ 10.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
